title: The Only High-Tech Bed for Better Rest
text:
LIKE NOTHING ELSE

Unlike other mattresses, the Pod’s water-based technology continuously cycles to maintain an even, perfectly cool surface temperature. This also prevents your body heat from being absorbed into the mattress and disrupting the balance of your sleep microclimate.

The Pod

Through its proprietary technology, the Pod balances every element of your body temperature and sleep environment to keep you thermoneutral.

Bed in a box

Traditional mattresses absorb body heat, causing temperatures to rise continuously as the night progresses.
